thread.title: Stream Ryan Adams’ New Album Prisoner
thread.title_full: Stream Ryan Adams’ New Album Prisoner

author: Evan Minsker
title: Stream Ryan Adams’ New Album Prisoner
text:
Ryan Adams Photo by Taylor Hill/FilmMagic 
Ryan Adams ’ new album Prisoner is out this Friday. The entire thing is streaming now via NPR . Listen below. Prisoner features the singles “ Do You Still Love Me? ,” “ Doomsday ,” and “ To Be Without You .” An alarmingly elaborate box set of Prisoner features a functioning play set. Adams will tour this year behind the album. He was the guest on yesterday’s episode of Marc Maron’s podcast “WTF.”
